categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Operation: Shell Game was a mission carried out by a team of Rebel Alliance agents at some point after the Battle of Yavin. During the mission, the agents infiltrated the Galactic Empire space station HM7-R.

Operation: Shell Game appeared in the roleplaying game adventure of the same name. It was included in the 2013 Beta edition of the Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game. This article assumes the adventure plays out as described.
